name: lrslib

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
lrslib Ver 6.2 is a self-contained ANSI C implementation of the reverse
search algorithm for vertex enumeration/convex hull problems and comes
with a choice of three arithmetic packages

dependencies.name: gmp
dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: polymake
dependent_to.description: polymake is open source software for research in polyhedral geometry

dependent_to.name: sympol
dependent_to.description: SymPol is a C++ tool to work with symmetric polyhedra
